faculty.title: Faculty
faculty.description: Represents a faculty within the university.

code.description: The unique code for the faculty (e.g., 'FICCT').

career.title: Career
career.description: Represents an academic program within a faculty.

name.description: The name of the academic program.

code.description: The unique code for the career (e.g., 'INF').

facultyCode.description: The code of the faculty this career belongs to.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Represents an academic subject or course.

code.description: The unique code for the subject (e.g., 'INF-111').

level.description: The academic level or semester for the subject.

credits.description: The number of credits the subject is worth.

name.description: The full name of the teacher.

code.description: The unique code for the teacher.

category.description: The academic category of the teacher.

dedication.description: The dedication level of the teacher.

avatar.description: URL to the teacher's avatar image.

classroom.title: Classroom
classroom.description: Represents a physical space like a classroom or laboratory.

code.description: The unique code for the classroom (e.g., '225-LC1').

capacity.description: The number of seats in the classroom.

status.description: The current status of the classroom.

academicPeriod.title: Academic Period
academicPeriod.description: Represents an academic period with start and end dates.

name.description: The name of the academic period (e.g., '1-2025').

startDate.description: The start date of the academic period.

endDate.description: The end date of the academic period.

status.description: The status of the academic period.

/classrooms/{classroomId}.description: Collection of university classrooms and laboratories.
